text: I made a one-line fix PR for clawdbot to fix a real issue. I knew what the problem was, could have done it myself. But I just wanted to try using clawdbot to fix it and create the PR. The fix works, I've reviewed and tested it myself. Will you ban me because clanker use?

İyi aga. En iyi Çin modeli bence. Opus 4.5 falan ile kıyaslanamaz Claude öyle bir şey yaptı ki geçmesi çok zor. Ama Ondan sonra gelebilecek en iyi modellerden biri. Şuna 40$ versen çok rahat app basarsın canavar gibi. Clawdbot ilede kullandım. İyi çalışıyor.
Bro, creó clawdbot, da igual si usó agentes o no, tú puedes usar agentes también, y no creaste clawdbot...

What ended up working for me was a small change in the workflow:

Instead of auto-posting, I ask Clawdbot to generate the tweet as a compose link, e.g.:


https://
x.com/compose/post?t
ext=hello%20friends
…

It opens the composer with the text pre-filled, so I just review it and click Post.

While experimenting with Bird + Clawdbot/Moltbot to post on X, I ran into an issue.

Reading works fine, but when trying to publish a tweet, the request gets blocked with a 403 saying it looks automated.

Je viens de faire un quick test sur 
http://
twin.so pour générer des agents AI et c’est vraiment de la balle. Interface fluide, qualité des agents. Bref après la lourdeur de l’install de clawdbot ça fait plaisir. 
En plus c’est Français (pour l’instant) donc souverain.
